document.full_text: mike huckabee leads a list of potential candidates for the 2012 u.s. republican nomination, edging out mitt romney, while support for sarah palin has slipped, according to a gallup poll released on friday.
document.title: huckabee and romney lead republican field: gallup
lines_and_colors: mike huckabee leads a list of potential candidates for the 2012 u.s. republican nomination, edging out mitt romney, while support for sarah palin has slipped, according to a gallup poll released on friday.
